test_emails.subject: Order Status Question
test_emails.body: Hi, I ordered a Fender Stratocaster last week (order #45823) and have not received any shipping updates. Where is my guitar?

test_emails.subject: Defective Product
test_emails.body: The acoustic guitar I received (order #39201) has a crack in the neck. This is unacceptable! I need to return this immediately and get my money back.

test_emails.subject: Product Inquiry
test_emails.body: Does the Gibson Les Paul Standard come with a hard case? Also, is it good for jazz music? I am an intermediate player looking to upgrade.

test_emails.subject: Warranty Question
test_emails.body: I bought a Marshall amp 8 months ago and now it is making weird buzzing noises. Is this covered under warranty? How do I get it repaired?

test_emails.subject: Multiple Issues
test_emails.body: Hello, I have several questions: 1) My order #52910 says delivered but I never got it, 2) I want to know if you have left-handed guitars, 3) What is your return policy if I do not like the sound? Please help!

test_emails.subject: Beginner Guitar Help
test_emails.body: Hi! I am completely new to guitar and want to learn. What guitar would you recommend for a beginner? My budget is around $300. Thanks!

test_emails.subject: Angry Customer
test_emails.body: This is the THIRD time I am contacting you! My order #48392 was supposed to arrive 2 days ago and I still do not have it. I need this for a gig this weekend. This is completely unprofessional!!!

test_emails.subject: Exchange Request
test_emails.body: I bought a red Fender Telecaster but I actually want the blue one. Can I exchange it? I have not opened the box yet. Order #41203.

test_emails.subject: Child Guitar Size
test_emails.body: What size guitar should I get for my 9-year-old daughter? She is about 4 feet 5 inches tall. Also, do you offer any kid-friendly starter packages?

test_emails.subject: Refund Status
test_emails.body: I returned a guitar 2 weeks ago (order #38475) and still have not received my refund. When will I get my money back?
